name: Champion's Dinner: Cat's Cradle
desc: When a character uses Ultimate to deal DMG to an enemy target, it is considered as Follow-up ATK. Increases DMG dealt by Follow-up ATKs by 15%.
enhanced_desc: When a character uses Ultimate to deal DMG to an enemy target, it is considered as Follow-up ATK. Increases DMG dealt by Follow-up ATKs by 55%.
